title: Where are the missions?
body:
it's been a few days since i haven't received any more missions
is the event over?

replies.body: What SteveTheMiner said!  Vs is over for now, but per the [Missions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008256847-Introducing-Missions) our devs aim to bring it back.  Hang tight!
Yes, the VS. event is over and there won't be any more missions for the event.
